Import Archives

Use the Import Archives dialog box (Admin | Import Archives) to import existing archives into a project database or project.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Show warning if versioned file already exists Select this check box to tell Version Manager to display a warning message when you attempt to import an archive for which a versioned file already exists in the project.
Archive Location Copy to project archive location Select to copy the archive from its current location to the project's archive location and to make the project's archive location the new archive location. When you select this option, you can set Show warning if archive already exists. This option is not available if the archives you selected to import already exist in the project's archive location.

Archive Location For 5.3/6.0 projects, select to import the archives into one of the project's existing archive locations.

Show warning if archive already exists Select this check box to tell Version Manager to display a warning when you attempt to import an archive that already exists in the project.

Use existing archive location Select to make the archive's current location the new archive location.
Include archives in subdirectories This field is only available if a directory is selected. Select to import all of the archives from the subdirectories of the selected directory.
Selected Archives Tab
Archives List Review the archives that you have selected to import into the project.

See Also
